name: ISO8601

aliases.name: Offset
aliases.comment: Offset represents the hour and minute timezone offset from UTC.

aliases.name: Time
aliases.comment: Record representing the time. Offset is tuple representing the hour and minute Â± from UTC.

values.name: add
values.comment: Add milliseconds to a Time records

values.name: decode
values.comment: Decode an ISO8601 string from JSON

values.name: diff
values.comment: the difference between two Time records in milliseconds

values.name: fromPosix
values.comment: Converts the Time.Posix type to an ISO8601.Time

values.name: fromString
values.comment:
Given an ISO 8601 compatible string, returns a Time record.

    ISO8601.fromString "2016-01-01T01:30:00-04:00"
    -- { year = 2016, month = 1, day = 1, hour = 1, minute = 30, second = 0, millisecond = 0, offset = -240) }
        : ISO8601.Time
    ISO8601.fromString "2016-11-07"
    --{ year = 2016, month = 11, day = 7, hour = 0, minute = 0, second = 0, millisecond = 0, offset = 0 }
        : ISO8601.Time
    ```

values.name: fromTime
values.comment: Converts the milliseconds relative to the Unix epoch to a Time record.

values.name: sub
values.comment: Subtract milliseconds from a Time records

values.name: toPosix
values.comment: Converts the Time to standard Time.Posix type

values.name: toString
values.comment: Converts a Time record to an ISO 8601 formated string.

values.name: toTime
values.comment: Converts the Time to milliseconds relative to the Unix epoch: `1970-01-01T00:00:00Z`

values.name: weekday
values.comment: Returns the day of the week from the Time record
